attributes.action: Let's require MPs to vote as their constituents did on Brexit
attributes.background: MPs are voting on Brexit according to their own views, disregarding the Referendum decision and the views of their own constituents

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency.

You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 
https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
